item.title: What are Needles
item.author: felix.niederwanger@suse.de (phoenix)
item.description: In this blog post we are going to give you the most easy introduction to what needles are and how you can use them. While there are many good talks and documentation on needles out there, it took me longer than it should have to find a easy-to-use and easy-to-understand introduction into this topic alone.

item.title: Background bash commands
item.author: felix.niederwanger@suse.de (phoenix)
item.description: This post describes the caveats and correct handling of the bash background operator within openQA.
